speech:
Haan, hostel facility available hai – 24x7 pani aur bijli, CCTV surveillance, aur warden on-site hoti hain for student safety.
Iske alawa, aapko hospital training bhi milegi jisme real patients ke saath kaam karna hoga."

❓ "Kya aap aur kuch jaanna chaahenge – jaise college location, recognition, ya clinical training ke baare mein?

Hostel mein safety ke liye CCTV aur warden 24x7 available rehte hain. Pani aur light bhi continuous hoti hai.
Course mein hospital-based training bhi included hai – real patient care ka part aapka learning hoga."

❓ "Kya aap location, seats, ya course accreditation ke baare mein bhi jaana chaahenge?
